jot.physics.fluids.eulerian

Class AbstractEulerianFluidSolver2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • jot.physics.fluids.eulerian.AbstractEulerianFluidSolver2D
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PracticalFluids2D, StableFluids2D

    public abstract class AbstractEulerianFluidSolver2D
extends Object
    Abstract class that each Eulerian Solver must extend.
    Author:
    G. Amador & A. Gomes

      • setup

        public abstract void setup(int n,
                           AbstractLinearSolver2D linearSolverDiffusion)
        * Set the grid size, the time step, and the linear solver to use.
        Parameters:
        n - grid cells width and length.
        linearSolverDiffusion - the linear solver to use in diffusion.

      • reset

        public abstract void reset()
        Reset the data structures. We use 1d arrays for speed.

        Update the fluid with a time step dt.
